article_title: Medicare penalizes South Florida hospitals for infections, mistakes
article_text:
Program was created under Affordable Care Act to reduce injuries

Two South Florida hospitals penalized for second year in a row

Medicare payments will be reduced by one percent for 2016

article_metadata.news-keywords: Hospitals, infections, injuries, mistakes, hospital-acquired conditions, Affordable Care Act, Medicare, penalties, Obamacare
article_metadata.description: Seven South Florida hospitals will have their Medicare payments reduced by one percent next year due to high rates of potentially avoidable infections and other injuries to patients, federal health officials reported this week.
article_metadata.title: Medicare penalizes South Florida hospitals for infections, mistakes | Miami Herald
